remarks: Special case of series sum over a finite upper integer index set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2014.)
statement:
fsumsers.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) -> ( F ` k ) = if ( k e. A , B , 0 ) ) $.
fsumsers.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
fsumsers.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fsumsers.4 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ ( M ... N ) ) $.
fsumsers $p |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A B = ( seq M ( + , F ) ` N ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d F k $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d k ph $.
